name: boilerplate-order-management
description: Order Management System - Clean Architecture with DDD

scripts.ef:update-db: dotnet ef database update --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi
scripts.ef:reset-db: dotnet ef database drop --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi --force && dotnet ef database update --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi
scripts.ef:list-migrations: dotnet ef migrations list --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi
scripts.ef:remove-migration: dotnet ef migrations remove --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi
scripts.ef:script: dotnet ef migrations script --project src/Infrastructure --startup-project src/WebApi --idempotent --output scripts/migrations/migration-script.sql
